name: vs-seeker
effect: Reveals trainers who want a rematch, by showing !! over their heads.  Each use drains the battery; requires 100 steps to charge.
short_effect: Allows rebattling of on-screen trainers. 100 steps to recharge.

flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A rechargeable unit
that flags battle-
ready TRAINERS.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A device that indicates TRAINERS
who want to battle. The battery
charges while traveling.
